d.name: v1.36.2 - Vector index zero-length vector Fix, Quantization with cache issue Fix
d.body:
## Breaking Changes 
*none*

## New Features
*none*

## Fixes
* Delay quantization until after cache prefilled by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10612
* chore(test): fix Test_UploadS3Journey by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10577
* fix(EC): pass correct max class version on batch add by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10616
* skip zero-length vector by @robbespo00 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10625


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.36.1...v1.36.2

d.name: v1.36.1 - Block Max-Wand performance improvements, Replication retry Fix
d.body:
## Breaking Changes 
*none*

## New Features
*none*

## Fixes
* fix(replication-retry): this reverts an introduced behaviour to retry node on loading shard  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10585
* revert(replication): type of returned error if shard is nil to retry on non existence  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10591
* perf: avoid bitmap Or per segment per search by using two bitmaps by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10594
* fix: better delete doc check by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10597
* fix(offloading): handle tenant offloading in case of empty tenant by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10587
* perf: pre-compute avg proplength by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10596
* fix: make prop lens atomic by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10599
* fix: update method calls to use ForEachLoadedShard for vector index config updates by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10603
* test: concurrent BMW flush, inserts, updates, deletes and search by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10600
* refact(EC): remove not needed wait on object getter by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10604
* fix(EC): pass correct max class version on batch add by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10610


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.36.0...v1.36.1

d.name: v1.35.11 - Block Max-Wand performance improvements, Replication retry Fix
d.body:
## Breaking Changes 
*none*

## New Features
*none*

## Fixes
* backport: Claude's settings by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10564
* Tombstone cleanup improvements part 2 by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10466
* chore(ci): switch runner in on-demand pipelines to ubicloud-standard-2 by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10571
* feature: non-blocking segments' deletions by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10502
* fix(EC): on updating a tenant and avoid calling the leader by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10514
* fix(replication-retry): this reverts an introduced behaviour to retry node on loading shard  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10585
* revert(replication): type of returned error if shard is nil to retry on non existence  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10591
* perf: avoid bitmap Or per segment per search by using two bitmaps by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10594
* fix: better delete doc check by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10597
* fix(offloading): handle tenant offloading in case of empty tenant by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10587
* perf: pre-compute avg proplength by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10596
* fix: make prop lens atomic by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10599
* fix: update method calls to use ForEachLoadedShard for vector index config updates by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10603
* test: concurrent BMW flush, inserts, updates, deletes and search by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10600
* refact(EC): remove not needed wait on object getter by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10604
* fix(EC): pass correct max class version on batch add by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/10610


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.35.10...v1.35.11
